name: Railroad Tracks
description: Railroad tracks is a 2D exploration based adventure game about a lonely circus artist who has fallen into amnesia. As you venture through his surreal twilight world, unsettling memories start to return.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/2000 Processor: 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
